channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Right-Wing Activists Are Targeting People for Allegedly Celebrating Charlie Kirk’s Death
item.description: Extremists and an anonymously run website are posting identifying details about people accused of celebrating Charlie Kirk’s murder online. Some of th...

item.title: The music industry is broken. OpenWav’s new app aims to change that
item.description: OpenWav is building a direct-to-fan platform for music artists which lets them keep more of the profits.

item.title: Tesla’s robotaxi plans for Nevada move forward with testing permit
item.description: Tesla can now test its autonomous vehicle technology on public streets in Nevada, but it still has steps to take if it wants to offer paid rides like ...

item.title: The 65 Best Movies on Disney+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Thunderbolts*, Sacramento, and Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: How China’s Propaganda and Surveillance Systems Really Operate
item.description: A series of corporate leaks show that Chinese technology companies function far more like their Western peers than one might imagine.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Boring Company suspends work on Vegas airport tunnel after ‘crushing injury’
item.description: A worker had to be rescued by the local fire department, but is reportedly stable. Dozens of Boring Company workers have been injured over the years i...

item.title: VC leaders from 01 Advisors take the Builders Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to share the scaling playbook
item.description: Adam Bain, Dick Costolo, and David Fischer — the operators behind Twitter and Meta’s growth — reunite at Disrupt 2025.

item.title: Save Big on Our Favorite Outdoor Security Cam
item.description: The Arlo Pro 5S is only $100 right now on Amazon.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Was Shot and Killed in a Post-Content-Moderation World
item.description: Videos of the shooting spread across TikTok, Instagram, and X. Researchers say that in some cases the platforms are falling short on enforcing their o...

item.title: Justice Department sues Uber for allegedly discriminating against people with disabilities
item.description: It's the latest in a long line of criticism — and action — against the company's treatment of people with physical disabilities.
